name: 30 Second Ambush
description:
This game was created in 5 days for the Weekly Game Jam #191 with the theme "Ambush".

This game is a fast paced arcade-like shooter with minimalist graphics where the goal is to reach the endpoint of the level within 30 seconds without dying. If you fail to reach the endpoint within that time, or you die to the enemies, the level will restart.

Controls: A/D = move, Space = Jump, LMB = Shoot, R = Restart, ESC = Pause.
